releaseNotes.title: KRTJ Desktop v1.6.6 - Upload Missed Opportunities & Enhanced AI Features! ï¿½ï¿½ðŸ“Š
features: NEW: Upload Missed Opportunities on Charts/Snapshots page - save trades you didn't take for learning!
NEW: Missed opportunities are NOT counted as trade entries - perfect for 'what if' analysis
NEW: Collapsible 'What is a Trading Playbook?' section for cleaner UI
ENHANCED: AI Chatbot now knows ALL platform features in comprehensive detail
ENHANCED: Homepage updated with complete feature descriptions including Market Data
IMPROVED: AI Assistant quick actions reflect latest capabilities
improvements: Enhanced Market Data page with Top 100/200/300 crypto rankings
Live sparkline charts showing 7-day trends for all cryptocurrencies
60-second auto-refresh for trending coins, gainers, and losers
Playbook strategies now support collapsible sections for better organization
Better visual distinction between actual trades and learning opportunities
Comprehensive AI knowledge base covering all 9 platform sections
Enhanced memory management with proper event listener cleanup
bugFixes: FIXED: Upload modal now properly validates all required fields
IMPROVED: Collapsible sections maintain state across sessions
ENHANCED: Better error handling for image uploads
OPTIMIZED: Faster data persistence for uploaded opportunities
SYNCHRONIZED: Both website and desktop versions updated with latest features
releaseNotes.notes: Major feature update with missed opportunity tracking and enhanced AI assistance! Upload and analyze trades you didn't take, organize your playbook better, and get comprehensive help from the AI chatbot. ï¿½ðŸ“Š
